mainSequence.step: Inspector logs in to the Inspection Portal
Portal validates Inspector credentials with the Inspection Database
Inspector's credentials are validated
Portal shows the Inspector's Dashboard
Inspector selects Assigned Inspections
Portal retrieves Assigned Inspections from the Database
List of Assigned Inspections is obtained
Portal displays the Assigned Inspections to the Inspector
Inspector selects an Inspection to conduct
Portal displays Inspection Details and Checklist to the Inspector
Inspector validates compliance for each item in the Inspection
Portal records Compliance Status for each item
Inspector submits the Inspection Results
Portal updates the Inspection Record in the Database
Confirmation of Update is received from the Database
Portal notifies the Customer of Inspection Completion
Customer logs in to view the Inspection Results
Portal displays the Inspection Results to the Customer
Customer acknowledges the Receipt of the Inspection Results
Portal updates the Acknowledgement Status in the Database
Acknowledgement of Receipt is recorded in the Database
